Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Mayfield
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-BOUND trains bypassing Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

  • For 95th-bound service from these stations, take a Howard-bound train to Harrison and transfer to a 95th-bound train.
  • For 95th-bound service to these stations, take a 95th-bound train to Cermak and transfer to Howard-bound train.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
